original: Naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na ajjhattam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca na bahiddhā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
